segment.source: Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps now support gamepad and remote control input.
segment.target: Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps now support gamepad and remote control input.

segment.source: Gamepads and remote controls are the primary input devices for Xbox and TV experiences.
segment.target: Gamepads and remote controls are the primary input devices for Xbox and TV experiences.

segment.source: UWP apps should be optimized for these input device types, just like they are for keyboard and mouse input on a PC, and touch input on a phone or tablet.
segment.target: UWP apps should be optimized for these input device types, just like they are for keyboard and mouse input on a PC, and touch input on a phone or tablet.

segment.source: Making sure that your app works well with these input devices is the most important step when optimizing for Xbox and the TV.
segment.target: Making sure that your app works well with these input devices is the most important step when optimizing for Xbox and the TV.

segment.source: You can now plug in and use the gamepad with UWP apps on PC which makes validating the work easy.
segment.target: You can now plug in and use the gamepad with UWP apps on PC which makes validating the work easy.

segment.source: To ensure a successful and enjoyable user experience for your UWP app when using a gamepad or remote control, you should consider the following:
segment.target: To ensure a successful and enjoyable user experience for your UWP app when using a gamepad or remote control, you should consider the following:

segment.source: Hardware buttons The gamepad and remote provide very different buttons and configurations.
segment.target: Hardware buttons The gamepad and remote provide very different buttons and configurations.

segment.source: XY focus navigation and interaction XY focus navigation enables the user to navigate around your app's UI.
segment.target: XY focus navigation and interaction XY focus navigation enables the user to navigate around your app's UI.

segment.source: Mouse mode Mouse mode lets your app emulate a mouse experience when XY focus navigation isn't sufficient.
segment.target: Mouse mode Mouse mode lets your app emulate a mouse experience when XY focus navigation isn't sufficient.
